name: The Manbutton Project
description:
The Manhattan Project was a research and development undertaking during World War II that produced the first nuclear weapons.

This has nothing to do with the game, we just thought it is a weird coincidence how both sound similar.

And there's nukes. That you set off. Ooooh you better make sure they don't go kablowy, otherwise you'll be in big trouble.

I'm talking overtime to clean up the mess that'd make. So you better call the support and get this fixed before lunch break.

Known Bugs: -Certain Keyboards do not register all key-presses, if the keys are all in a certain group

Credits:

Code - @AndideBob
Art - @ToastiChron
Music by Andrew Sitkov
